name: Simplistic (AlexxS)
description:
This is my first game made with Unity!

I'm an italian game developer and this platformer is my first game. The goal is simple: reach the flag to win the level. There are 5 levels.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Use arrow keys to move the ball.
  • Don't fall.
  • Some platforms or spikes aren't real, remember it. 
  • Reach the black flag at the end of each level to win.
  • Don't touch spikes.
  • The "Bouncy Floors" make you jump higher.

If you find any bug leave a comment and explain the problem, please. 

Enjoy the game! 

Scripts, arts and musics made by AlexxS_ .
